title: Slice of Hell Cake
summaries: The Slice of Hell Cake is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Baby Imp pet to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Baby Imp will spread its arms and fly to catch up to the player. The Slice of Hell Cake has a 1/10 (10%) chance of being found in Shadow Chests and a 1/20 (5%) chance of being found in Obsidian Crates and Hellstone Crates.
